import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from './assets/images/logo_imdb.svg'; export default function Nav({setTheme, theme}){ const themeToggle = () => { theme === 'light' ? setTheme("dark") : setTheme("light"); } return(
  • Films

  • Mode {theme}

  • Login
  • Logout
) }
